org.greatage.ioc.resource
Class AbstractResource

java.lang.Object
  org.greatage.ioc.resource.AbstractResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
Resource
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClasspathResource
public abstract class AbstractResource
extends Object
implements Resource

This class represents abstract Resource implementation that implements all base logic.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Ivan Khalopik
